definitions.text: how something is done or how it happens
examples: in the characteristic New York style

definitions.text: how a result is obtained or an end is achieved
examples: an example is the best agency of instruction

definitions.text: a line leading to a place or point

examples: our paths in life led us apart
genius usually follows a revolutionary path

definitions.text: any artifact consisting of a road or path affording passage from one place to another
examples: he said he was looking for the way out
hardly enough elbow room to turn around

definitions.text: the property of distance in general
examples: it's a long way to Moscow

definitions.text: doing as one pleases or chooses
a general category of things; used in the expression `in the way of'
examples: they didn't have much in the way of clothing

definitions.text: a portion of something divided into shares
examples: they split the loot three ways

definitions.text: to a great degree or by a great distance; very much (`right smart' is regional in the United States)
examples: the other side of the hill is right smart steeper than the side we are on
